CustomField.description: Actual spend on Site Rental for this Event. Populated automatically from related Budget & Expense records but can be overridden if entered directly. Updates to B&E records will overwrite manual field entries though.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Actual spend on Site Rental for this Event. Populated automatically from related Budget & Expense records but can be overridden if entered directly. Updates to B&E records will overwrite manual field entries though.
CustomField.label: Site Rental Expenses
